query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guestReviews (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  source ENUM('google', 'booking', 'airbnb', 'expedia', 'tripadvisor', 'facebook', 'agoda', 'hostelworld', 'direct') NOT NULL,
  externalId VARCHAR(255),
  reviewUrl TEXT,
  reviewerName VARCHAR(255),
  reviewerAvatar TEXT,
  reviewerCountry VARCHAR(64),
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(500),
  content TEXT,
  language VARCHAR(16) DEFAULT 'en',
  sentiment ENUM('positive', 'neutral', 'negative') DEFAULT 'neutral',
  topics JSON,
  apartmentCode VARCHAR(32),
  stayDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
  hasReply BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  replyContent TEXT,
  replyDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
  repliedBy INT,
  aiSummary TEXT,
  aiSuggestedReply TEXT,
  reviewDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  importedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
